mapper.sql: id, name, stock, purchase_date, create_time, update_time, is_active
mapper.insert: insert into product_bak (id, name, stock, purchase_date, create_time, update_time, is_active) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update product_bak

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
